# Replay

> Great blogs, delivered over time.

Replay is a service that lets you subscribe to classic blog archives and receive posts as a drip email series. One post at a time, on your own schedule.

## How it works

1. Browse available feeds at https://replay.pub
2. Pick a feed and enter your email to subscribe
3. Receive one blog post per email, delivered on your chosen schedule
4. Posts arrive in the original publication order, starting from the first

## Available content

Replay hosts curated feeds from well-known blog authors. Each feed represents a blog or a tagged subset of a blog. Feeds are listed on the homepage grouped by author.

## Key pages

- Homepage: https://replay.pub — browse all available feeds
- Feed page: https://replay.pub/feeds/{slug} — view feed details and subscribe
- Blog page: https://replay.pub/blogs/{slug} — view all posts from a blog
- Request: https://replay.pub/request — request and vote for new blogs

## Technical details

- Emails contain the full blog post text, formatted for readability
- Subscribers can pause, resume, or cancel at any time from their dashboard
- Delivery frequency is configurable per subscription
